name: Thesmophoria
description:
Thesmophoria is a third person shooter where you immerse yourself into Ancient Greece. Team up & battle against each other in multiple game modes.

Conquest- Control the objectives to earn points over time, the more objectives you control the faster your team gain points.
Rush- Destroy or defend the objectives, if the attacker team runs out of reinforcements the defender team wins.
Kill Confirmed- Kill players of the opposing team and collect the dogtags to earn points, you can also collect dogtags from your team to deny the points for the other enemy team.
Team Deathmatch- Kill the enemy players to gain points.
Free For All- Kill every other player to gain points.
Capture The Flag- Capture the enemy flag and bring it to your own base to make points, if the enemy team has your flag you will have to retrieve it first.

Play single player with bots or multiplayer with humans.
Either way, Don't disappoint the Gods....
